biggrph

Class AbstractBigGraph<A extends dht.DHT<?,?>,E extends dht.DHT<?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bigobject.LiveDistributedObject<java.io.Serializable,java.io.Serializable>
      • biggrph.AbstractBigGraph<A,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - the type of the local structure used on each cluster node to store the attributes of the vertices. Must be a subclass of DHT.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigGraph, BigGraphLong

    public abstract class AbstractBigGraph<A extends dht.DHT<?,?>,E extends dht.DHT<?,?>>
extends bigobject.LiveDistributedObject<java.io.Serializable,java.io.Serializable>
    Abstract base class for graphs with attributes on the vertices.
